default_runtime.title: Default Runtime in Minutes
default_runtime.description: Default number of minutes to run zones if not provided. Could be usefull for blowing out lines

use_irrigation_display.title: Display as Irrigation System in HomeKit

show_standby.title: Expose switch for controller standby
show_standby.description: Exposes standby mode switch, when turned on all schedules from Rachio will be disabled.

show_runall.title: All zones
show_runall.description: Adds a switch to run all zones for the default time.

show_schedules.title: Expose switches for schedules
show_schedules.description: Exposes schedules as defined in the Rachio app as a switches for quick run from HomeKit.

The address must match the address configured in the Rachio app, review the log file to see how the adresses as configured in the Rachio app.

HomeKit Display

Display this accessory in HomeKit as a irrigation system with integrated sprinker zones.
If unchecked, the irrigation system zones will displayed as individual tiles with the option in Homekit to show single or separate.
